item.description:
** FREE ADVANCED SCREENING - RUN FAT BOY RUN**

THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 28TH @ 7PM
Fenway Regal Theater

Starring Simon Pegg, film synopsis included below and more information available at RUN FAT BOY RUN

Please print out the pass located in the group's file for admission, each pass admits two - feel free to print as many as you need. Just as an FYI: seating is not guaranteed and is available on a first come first served basis, so arrive early!

Email advanced.screening@gmail.com with "RUN FAT BOY RUN" as the subject line if you have any further questions.


Synopsis: Five years ago Dennis (Simon Pegg) was at the altar about to marry Libby (Thandie Newton), his pregnant fianc√©e. He got cold feet and ran for the hills and he?s been going in circles ever since. When Dennis discovers Libby?s hooked up with high-flying-go-getter Whit (Hank Azaria), he realizes it?s now or never. He enters a marathon to show he?s more than a quitter, but then finds out just how much sweat, strain and tears it takes to change. Nobody gives him a chance but Dennis knows this is his only hope to be more than a running joke. But does Dennis have the stuff to trade his cold feet for running shoes? RUN, FAT BOY, RUN is a romantic comedy that affirms that true love isn?t a sprint, it?s a marathon.
item.why: Simon Pegg's last films, Shaun of the Dead and Hot Fuzz have become cult classics among film enthusiasts. Don't miss this opportunity to see the film before everyone else!
item.name: FREE ADVANCED SCREENING - RUN FAT BOY RUN
